description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**General English Fall 2018**

**8:10-10:00, Fridays**

Classroom: 誠206

Instructor: Chen-Yu Liu (chenyuliu1019@ntnu.edu.tw)

**Textbook:**

Keynote 4 (Available at 師大書苑)

Online resource: [http://ame.eltkeynote.com/student-book-audio/student-book-4](http://ame.eltkeynote.com/student-book-audio/student-book-4)

**Course Description and Objectives:**

This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be offered the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas from all over the world.

**Requirements & Grading policy:**

*   **Attendance and Participation 30%**

Punctual attendance and active participation are required. If you are habitually late or absent, points will be deducted and you may fail this course. Exceptions are allowed only under emergent circumstances or notification in advance. Participation also includes teamwork and group projects.

*   **World Café (About-Me Presentation) 20%**

#Theme: Follow the guidelines from Presentation 1 (p. 49) and Presentation 2 (p. 87).

Pick one topic as your own presentation topic.

#Details: 2-3 minutes. Use visual aids (photos, posters, etc.).

*   **In-class Quizzes 15%**

*   **Presentation (Book talk) 20%**

*   **Reflection writing & Word list\*3 10%**

*   **Book recommendation (Lexile Reading Project/Scholastic books) 5% (and bonus)**

Select at least three books that you read throughout the semester and write short comments on them. Post your comments on your Padlet.
